name: FollowYourHeart
description:
"Follow your heart" is a first person 3D platformer game about finding your lover in the dream. The dream is another dimension different from real life. According to the heart beats rate, the player needs to jump high and far enough to across the rocks, avoid obstacles and meet your lover at the end of your surreal journey. The movement of gameplay is flying through the platforms with energy hook that make the player think out more strategies to pass the level. Low-poly 3D geometry art style guides player to another dimension.

3D Artist: Jimmz zhang
Programmer : Luke Li
